parameters.name: SuppressionState
parameters.description: Suppression state as defined in swFeatureSuppressionAction_e

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_opt set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

title: IFeature.SetSuppression2
description: Sets the suppression state of this feature.
signature:
System.Boolean SetSuppression2( 
   System.Int32
SuppressionState
,
   System.Int32
Config_opt
,
   System.Object
Config_names
)

parameters.name: SuppressionState
parameters.description: Suppression state as defined in swFeatureSuppressionAction_e

parameters.name: Config_opt
parameters.description: Configuration option as defined in swInConfigurationOpts_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Config_names
parameters.description: Array of configuration names; valid only if Config_opt set to swInConfigurationOpts_e.swSpecifyConfiguration

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks:
This method requires that you specify Config_opt.
SOLIDWORKS does not allow suppressing features while a PropertyManager page is open.
